description: Fiction books contain stories created from the imagination of the author. These books can be based on real events but with fictionalized details.
Romance novels focus on love stories and relationships, often with emotional and heartfelt narratives.
Science Fiction books explore futuristic concepts, advanced technologies, and imaginative worlds, often questioning the role of humanity.
Fantasy books transport readers to magical worlds filled with mythical creatures, epic quests, and fantastical elements.
Non-fiction books are based on factual information and real events, offering insights into history, biographies, and self-improvement.
Mystery and Thriller books keep readers on the edge of their seats with gripping stories filled with suspense, crime, and unexpected twists.
